title: Make Pgvector Faster Than Pinecone and 75% Cheaper With This New Open Source Extension
author: Avthar Sewrathan
description: Pgvector, pgvectorscale, and pgai are all open source under the PostgreSQL License and are available for you to use in your AI projects.
cntitle: 使用这个新的开源扩展，让 Pgvector 比 Pinecone 更快，价格便宜 75%
cndescription: Pgvector、pgvectorscale 和 pgai 都是根据 PostgreSQL 许可证发布的开源软件，您可以将它们用于您的 AI 项目。
